name: Ridged Kusite
originalText: {1}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: Causing a creature to gain first strike after first-strike combat damage has been dealt won’t stop that creature from dealing regular combat damage.
